Enemy Territories and the Dates Hostilities Ended
The table below lists enemy territories and the date hostilities ended in each.
Territory
Date Hostilities Ended
North Africa
May 13, 1943
Sicily
August 17, 1943
Continental Europe
May 7, 1945
Middle East
May 7, 1945
Areas occupied by Japanese forces
July 4, 1945
